data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Caldara, Roberto, Ić, Milana Desan Č, Gassmann, Andre, Legarreta, Lorenza, Emerson, Brent C., Toševski, Ivo (2008): On the identity of Rhinusa hispida (Brullé) and its current synonyms (Coleoptera: Curculionidae). Zootaxa 1805: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182657
